QuestData.Title: Returned Sevenfold
QuestData.Description: The agents of the Lich King have foolishly trespassed upon these lands where the power of life rules supreme. All harm they inflict will be returned to them sevenfold.$B$BThe monster directly responsible for corrupting the land is known as Thalgran Blightbringer; you will find him just to the north of here. Take this ward and use it to reflect the power of death upon him. Show the Scourge that the power of life prevails above all.
QuestData.LogDescription: The Avatar of Freya wants you to defeat Thalgran Blightbringer by using Freya's Ward to reflect his Deathbolts back to him sevenfold.
QuestData.RewardText: You continue to prove yourself, $n. Perhaps I was too quick to judge you.$B$BI had assumed you were here with the poachers who were recently stranded in my lands, but perhaps you're ready to put that behind you.
